name: EC2NetworkInterfacePrivateIPSpecification
description: The PrivateIpAddressSpecification type is an embedded property of the AWS::EC2::NetworkInterface type.

properties.name: PrivateIpAddress
properties.description: The private IP address of the network interface.

properties.name: Primary
properties.description: Sets the private IP address as the primary private address. You can set only one primary private IP address. If you don't specify a primary private IP address, Amazon EC2 automatically assigns a primary private IP address.
